bioAsHtml: I am a freelance software engineer based in France and the Netherlands. I work on data engineering, distributed computing and machine learning related projects. I co-organize the Paris Datageek Meetup, and regularly speak on big data related subjects.

acceptedTalks.title: Beyond the CAP theorem, consistency without consensus with CRDTs
Building high performance servers with Twitter Finagle.
